Author: everythingabove02
Text: I agree with you - freezing 25/8 is definitely worse that sweating all the time, I was overweight before and I was always the one wearing the least clothes   Now I'm a living wardrobe for my friends when being out

Author: synedchdochee
Text: being cold all the time is actually affecting my mental health more than a lot of other side effects of my eating disorder tbh. I can't sit on the couch without 2 blankets or I'm PAINFULLY numb. The only time I feel normal is when I'm at the gym (which they keep at a constant 80 degrees) and when I'm taking a really hot shower. It's fucking awful. It was very warm and sunny today and I was still wearing a thermal undershirt, sweater and leggings under my jeans today while everyone else was out in tank tops and shorts, and I was still. freezing. I'm at a normal weight, and am still freezing all the time. When I was obese I was always sweating but this is so so so much worse.
